detail_desc: Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a rounded front, short dolman sleeves and no fasteners.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.

V-neck cold shoulder blouse in airy chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders, an elasticated seam at the waist and flounce at the hem. The blouse is made partly of recycled polyester.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-style jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a cotton poplin collar and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Cotton poplin broderie anglaise trim at the cuffs and hem.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable imitation leather strap and metal buckle. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
A pair of metal hoop earrings decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter 4 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in linen with a resort collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short slits in the sides and a straight-cut hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shirt in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Wide, V-neck blouse in an airy cotton weave with long, wide sleeves and a gathered seam under the bust. Embroidered pattern and cutwork embroidery around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Velour all-in-one pyjamas with an appliqué on the front, and press-studs down one side and one leg.
Poncho in a soft, fine knit with a draped neckline and open sides. Length at the front and back approx. 70 cm.

Padded satin jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, concealed pockets with a press-stud in the side seams, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Suit trousers in superstretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Hook-and-eye fastening and a zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Satin baseball jacket with an embroidered motif on the chest and back, a striped stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Jetted front pockets, one inner pocket and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Leggings in soft jersey with cut-out rips at the front and an elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and slim legs.
Tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and sewn-on bow tie. Buttons at the cuffs and press-studs at the crotch.

Bra with self-adhesive cups and no shoulder straps or back making it perfect for wearing under strapless or backless garments. Adjustable lacing at the front. Moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Can be washed and reused.
Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top and a sweetheart neckline. Shoulder straps with elastication at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Shirt in softly draping twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers in imitation suede and mesh with lacing at the front, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Studio Collection. Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a deep neckline front and back and zigzag seams along the edges. High-cut legs, and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyamide content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Fitted top in cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim, and elbow-length sleeves.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. 5-pocket jeans in undyed organic cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a high waist, button fly with matt, gold-coloured metal buttons and straight, ankle-length legs. Manufactured sustainably without toxic chemicals or unnecessary water wastage using cotton grown without the use of artificial fertilisers or pesticides.
Ankle-length trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.

Block-coloured trainers in imitation leather and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Linings in mesh made from recycled polyester. Cotton twill insoles and patterned soles.
Cotton cap with elastication at the back.

Knee-length dress in a viscose weave with smocking around the neckline and a small, frilled collar. Opening at the front with ties, long raglan sleeves with smocked cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a low-cut back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts and concealed elastication at the hem.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with pleats at the top, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and tiers to the hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Trousers woven in a viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and tapered legs.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and zip down the front. Front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a button at the cuffs and a wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and ties at one side.

Set with an Alice band and wings. Satin-covered Alice band decorated with fabric flowers, ears and a padded, shimmering unicorn horn. Slightly transparent wings with a glitter print and satin-covered elastic shoulder straps. The wings are edged in faux fur.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and an open chest pocket.

Trainers in imitation leather with a padded top edge, padded tongue and lacing at the front. Contrasting colour details in imitation suede at the heels and toes, and a print motif on the tongue and one side. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles with a patterned underneath for a good grip. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform front approx. 2 cm. Heel approx. 9 cm.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Stand-up collar, detachable hood, press-studs down the front and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening with ties at the top. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Sewn-in jersey inner dress.
Ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, a low crotch and straight, wide legs.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a text print motif and V-neck with decorative lacing.
Short, wide T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, printed sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Jumper in a jacquard knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved dress in cotton velvet with a round neck, buttons down the back, and seam with a skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined at the top.

Double-breasted, ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a sheen. Notch lapels, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and diagonal side pockets. Seam at the waist, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, a decorative back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Three-strand neckline of thin metal chains with two pendants. Adjustable length, 39-47 cm.
Calf-length skirt in satin with a high waist and decorative ties at the front. Concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Unlined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Double-breasted pea coat in pile with narrow notch lapels, buttons at the front, side pockets and one inner pocket. Tabs with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Lined.
Loafers with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Dress in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the back and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit.

prod_name: TP BILLY Basic 2-p S/S r n BB
detail_desc: T-shirts in organic cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, embroidered flowers on the front and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Shirt in washed linen with a turn-down collar and half-length button placket with a classic front. Yoke at the back, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Straight fit with a rounded hem.
Straight-cut dress in crinkled chiffon with lace details and a lined skirt. Deep V-neck with lacing, a seam at the waist and long sleeves with wide, buttoned lace cuffs.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a deep neckline at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved base layer top in, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric.
